name: ChatGPT
description: An AI language model developed by OpenAI, designed to generate human-like text based on input prompts.

name: Claude
description: An AI assistant developed by Anthropic, designed to assist with various tasks such as writing, research, coding, and math, utilizing advanced language models to provide detailed and relevant responses.

name: Grok
description: xAI's chatbot designed to provide an alternative perspective to mainstream AI models, emphasizing free speech.

name: Gemini
description: Google's AI chatbot integrated into various services, offering conversational assistance and information retrieval.

name: Character.ai
description: A platform allowing users to create and interact with user-generated AI characters, simulating various personalities.

name: DeepSeek Chat
description: DeepSeek Chat is an AI chatbot developed by DeepSeek, capable of answering questions, solving logic problems, and writing computer programs.

name: Microsoft Copilot
description: An AI assistant integrated across Microsoft 365 applications, Windows 11, and Bing, designed to enhance productivity by assisting with tasks like content creation, data analysis, and information retrieval.

name: Perplexity AI
description: An AI-powered conversational search engine that provides direct answers to user queries by integrating large language models with real-time web data, offering cited sources for verification.

name: Mistral AI
description: A French AI startup specializing in open-weight large language models, offering advanced AI solutions and services.

name: Google AI Studio
description: Google AI Studio is a platform that enables developers to build, deploy, and manage AI models and applications, integrating Google's advanced AI technologies like the Gemini language model.

name: Meta AI
description: Meta AI is the artificial intelligence research division of Meta Platforms, focusing on advancing AI technologies and their applications across various domains.
